metadata.Title: CVE-2020-17509 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: ATS negative cache option is vulnerable to a cache poisoning attack. If youhave this option enabled, please upgrade or disable this feature. ApacheTraffic Server versions 7.0.0 to 7.1.11 and 8.0.0 to 8.1.0 are affected.

criterions.comment: trafficserver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
